SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO ,PRT_AT_CODE ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019',PRT_AT_CODE) AS PRT_AT_CODE_NM ,FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM ,FCLTS_GBN ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_GBN_NM(FCLTS_GBN) AS FCLTS_GBN_NM ,FCLTS_SE ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_SE_NM(FCLTS_SE) AS FCLTS_SE_NM ,FCLTS_KND ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_KND_NM(FCLTS_KND) AS FCLTS_KND_NM ,TO_CHAR(CNST_BEGIN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')||'~'||TO_CHAR(CNST_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNST_DT ,TO_CHAR(BLD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BLD_DT ,OWNER ,CNSTRTR ,LOC FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = 'C1' AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO IS NOT NULL) USING (FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) WHERE 1 = 1
AND FCLTS_GBN = #sFcltsGbn#
AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM = #sFcltsMngGroupNm#
ORDER BY PRT_AT_CODE DESC ) S ) T
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM( SELECT T1.PRT_FCLTY_NM AS PRT_FCLTY_NM ,T2.STRCT_FMT AS STRCT_FMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.BERTH,0),'99,990')) AS BERTH ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD AS PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT AS PRT_FCLTY_UNIT ,T1.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT AS PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT ,T2.FENDER_KND_CD AS FENDER_KND_CD ,T2.FENDER_PMNT_ITV AS FENDER_PMNT_ITV ,T2.FENDER_FMT AS FENDER_FMT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CVL_ENG_FCLTY_SPEC_F T2 ON (T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO=T2.FCLTS_MNG_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_ASSETS_CD_F T3 ON (T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=T3.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) WHERE 1=1 AND T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'C' AND T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = 'C1' AND T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# ORDER BY GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ) S
